title: API Keys
description: Manage API keys for AI providers

notConfigured.title: Keyring Proxy Not Configured
notConfigured.description: The keyring proxy is not configured. Set <proxyAdminUrl>PROXY_ADMIN_URL</proxyAdminUrl> and <proxyAdminToken>PROXY_ADMIN_TOKEN</proxyAdminToken> environment variables to enable centralized API key management.

addDialog.title: Add API Key
addDialog.description: Add a new API key for an AI provider.
addDialog.label: Label
addDialog.labelHint: Optional name to identify this key
addDialog.tagHint: Bots with matching tags will use this key. Leave empty for default.

deleteDialog.title: Delete API Key
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the {vendor} key "{label}"? This action cannot be undone.
